Methods in net.entersol.iogate with parameters of type IOGateException
 void IOResponce.onCallBackFailure(IOGateException ioge)
          Called when the service failed to return successfully
This method is called if there is a problem occurred to the service; problems like: disconnection of network wrong service call unauthorized call problems inside service itself
